mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_ProdtPay (DutyYn, StudyYn, SubjYn, ImgYn, AcuntId, ProdId, ProdType, Price, PayDt, OrgId, TurnId, PayYn, InsId, InsDt, UptId, UptDt) VALUES (#{dutyYn}, #{studyYn}, #{subjYn}, #{imgYn}, #{acuntId}, #{prodId}, #{prodType}, #{price}, #{payDt}, #{orgId}, #{turnId}, #{payYn}, #{insId}, #{insDt}, #{uptId}, #{uptDt})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS payId
